content: This is honestly perfect, and I mean PERFECT for my needs! For a tiny fee thus planner will help you plan everything necessary, you can add notes to your calendar - easily update your various collections and bundles, etc! It's just... So great
Probably useful for older versions of the game, needs a way to change bundles to do remix bundles. Long press would be a good way to edit.
Such a good app to help you play stongly recommed to mostly newer players but app helpdull for everyone .
I absolutely LOVE this app! But I took a star off because of a feature I feel is missing. A checklist for the shipped items, it would make things for a completionist so much easier..

Worth the money! I really like this app and I consult with it every time I play. It is great for keeping track of collections and for easy access to good gifts for Stardew friends. You can have multiple farms on it so no need to lose progress if you start a new run. Interface is very nice, looks good and works well. Would be cool to have an inventory tracker for recipes so I can ensure I have all ingredients but it is still fantastic as it is. Thanks!
Needs updating... The bulletin board is different in 1.5
Neat I like the simple layout ‚ù§Ô∏è I was kinda disappointed that it didn't contain any of the crafting recipes tho.
Love how this app works but with the new update the app could use a upgrade also.
replyContent: Thank you Kelly :) I'm very glad you like it

content: III Stars; No Flounder.

Love the app, really useful so I don't miss the traveling cart and the queen of sauce episodes, birthdays and such. Would be better if the villagers location schedules were in the app instead of an external link. Edit: I appreciate you adding the list of what the universal loves /likes/ neutral /dislike gifts are that I asked for on last review. I know this doesn't get updated much, mainly due to the game not getting many changes.
replyContent: Thank you for the comment :) I wanted to include the schedules since the first release but I didn't antecipated the amount of work it took to add all that information. Unfortunately I had to leave that for later but I'll implement it in the future

content: Best stardew valley guide yet, extreamly user friendly, but I wish it had a couple things I've seen in some of the other stardew apps like hide tasks when completed, a search bar, crop, fish and ore stats like rairity, difficulty, and for crops $ per day. Still a great app but could be better, hope dev's see this and add said stuff to app

userName: Truth will set you free Wow
content: I like it since I'm a beginner.
Seems the app is no longer supported or updated, thus having missing content which will most likely not be added.
It has everything you need, amd it's easy to use! Highly recommend!
I find it very easy to use and the fact that you can add notes to the calendar itself is very handy.
Easy to use. Great for replays. Links to the Wiki for more comprehensive information. I would prefer not having a link to more comprehensive information but this is a great app for the cost.

Very useful as a checklist! Doesn't have all the information the wiki has, but it also never claimed to be a wiki. Its a thorough checklist for the CC and museum. I also think the daily planner is very helpful to remind me to do things that I may otherwise forget about. Would love to see a more expanded version of the villagers, though. Something like heart events, questions that help friendships, an actual integrated set up to locate a villager without linking to the wiki, quests, etc.

I've been trying out a few of the companion apps for Stardew Valley and this one is nice, except virtually all functionality is nil with the absence of a search function.. I'm glad I used my rewards money on this or else I'd be sorry, even for the loss of 99 cents lol

I have seen a lot of stardew companion apps; some free, some paid. I haven't tried the others, nor would I want to after this! I had a google play store coupon for a free download of an app at a certain price. I figured I'd try since I never purchase apps. I would recommend this to everyone. I truly believe this is not only worth the money for the creators time and efforts, but for how beautiful and simple this app is. I love it!
replyContent: Aww thanks :) I really appreciate your review. I'm glad you've found it helpful. Have fun!

content: Since the game had its 1.4 update this is no longer the best planner but it's still decent.
Very easy to use, only thing I would add would maybe be a rare crow, items cooked, and maybe a star drop tracker. But maybe that's just me. Its definitely worth the purchase!
A huge help in such an overwhelming game! Would love to see other checklists that are essential to achievements as well, but otherwise, it's amazing and runs perfectly.
Constantly crashing,will not open at all. Have uninstalled and reinstalled and have the same problem

Been using this app while playing SDV for around a year now and I love it. It's missing the food collection and I'd love to see updates for the 1.4 patch or maybe a way to track who you've gifted to each week. But overall I don't have any complaints. I forgot about this one for a bit and downloaded another one and didn't like the layout at all so I went hunting for this one again.

This is my favourite Stardew planner. It has almost everything you need but it does have a couple things that could be better. For instance it has links for each villagers schedule but that just leads to the wiki. It would be nice to have a crop listing with $/day stats and the like and a recipe guide but overall it is an amazing planner
Very useful! But needs more info, update when tha game updates and schedules in the app rather than just going to the wiki
No more update. There's a better app which offers very much greater content. Not worth for money.
Super helpful. I found myself going to the villager and season wiki pages often. This really speeds it up and is worth every penny to have on your phone
Fantastic App, I use it everytime I'm on Stardew! üòä
Great, I use it for every save
Thank you so much for this app! I no longer miss birthdays and love the lists for bundles and the museum! I use it on the daily.

I like the layout and it has most of everything I need. My only suggestion is to add a section that lists all the farm upgrades (how much of each material how much an upgrade costs, like coops, barns, stable, etc.) and also make the villager schedules available offline.
Super helpful until I switched phones and redownloaded the app only to find my data gone :( Is there a way to transfer data?

Its okay. It's annoying to find things to check off because they have them in a different order in the app than they do in the game. They also don't track everything that the game tracks. No recipes or anything.
Please please please make the schedules of the villagers available offline it's the only thing keeping me from using this app but other than that it's great and the whole layout is neat :)

this app is great! i use it often, however i wish that you didnt have to leave the app to look at npc character schedules, and i wish it would also say what materials youd need for buildings (ie. coops, barns, sheds). i still have to go on the wiki or ask robin what i need.
Does not allow the editing of notes. Does not show the locations of villagers per season. Does not show items, their use if any, and where to get them.

perfect companion for tracking your progress across multiple farms. Very helpful daily reminder of to-dos to help you keep up with recipes and the traveling salesman. Community center and museum progress checklist is fantastic and accompanied by very useful images of all items. locations and times for all fish. Just the best companion to an amazing game. lots of updates and bug fixes as well. truly an app that is more than just a money grab. 2 word review: WORTH IT!

I absolutely love this app. I've used it every time I play stardew valley to keep track of everything. It's been a lifesaver tracking bundles and villager likes/dislikes especially. I wish it had more in it about the game itself, like where to find items besides fish and bundle items or a list of automatic NPC requests in our journal. This app gets the job done, but it has so much potential for more.
If I don't use the app frequently, itdoesn't save the bundle completion, which is expremely annoying.
Add offline schedule please.
It is dam near perfect, it has multiple profiles a day by day planer a list for the community center and museum ect. Well done devs.

I have tried all the the apps like this. Paid for them all to test them. My opinion is this app needs some work. I paid $1.99 on another app for pro features and it was actually worth it. But this was almost $3 but has LESS features. The UI is good & runs smooth. However, the main problem I personally have is as fallows: The villager's schedules shouldn't have to be viewed externally. Not for a paid app. I do NOT want a refund or anything. Just Please change this one flaw. üôè‚úåÔ∏è
great app. super helpful. would love if I could sort fish by season as well as alphabetically. would be great to have an "as catalogued" sort option as well.
Should have add schedule in the app not just a link to website
Fantastic resource. The ONLY thing it's missing is crop information. Prices, availability, grow time and such. Will update review if they appear üòâ

It's very helpful and easy to use but it still requires to use the the internet to show villagers schedule its definitely not the worth buying for, please add some details so I could play offline peacefully.
great app. maybe add crafting recipes for non standard items?

This app is pretty useful. I love the tips about last day to plant crops. Would be very convenient to be able to search items to see which bundle uses it. A lot of times I know I need something but I cant remember which bundle it goes in. Once that feature is added I think its worthy of 5 stars
Not usefull. Does nor sync with game, have to use internet search either way.

really well done application. only a few small things missing, but they would take a lot of work to add (i.e. recipes, allow ediable notes (i made a spelling mistake in my one note so i had to retype)) but nothing major. :)
All the information you need at your fingertips! Wonderful app!!!
The only companion app you will ever need for Stardew Valley! Seriously in love with how helpfull it has been! ‚ù§
Great UI and easy to use app with lots of information and tracking.
Just what you need

The app is very clean and user friendly. The low score comes from the fact that it is overall very lacking in its content and absolutely not worth paying for. No villagers schedule, no crafting list, no collections list (just the museum and fish)... Really the bare minimum. You're better off having the wiki open and downloading one of the many available spreadsheet with checklists.
it doesn't have much for the value of the money and its not as usefull when it is offline. I would only get this if there is nothing else you can find :(
worth every penny. this keeps me up to date with my farm. thank you so much.
Would prefer if there was a checklist for heart events and details on triggering them built in.
Extremely handy.
Mostly good, however often it will close and reload after turning the screen on my Oneplus 5 (OOS 9.0.0) even when it's the active app. This makes using it frustrating.

i really like this app! very handy, organised and easy to use! the only thing i would say i miss are: 1. recipes and an additional checklist for every recipe (like fish and artifacts) 2. some type of search engine for all items that shows how much each villager likes the item
such a good app! i usually forget what i have done if i dont play for a while and end up starting, but now i can keep track of everything and have the wiki guide at my finger tips!
This is extremely handy, while I would like more content added in general, I also do really appreciate the simple and easy to use interface
This app is good, but i think it could use more detail. It sometimes directs you to the wiki, when it could easily just clarify within the app itself
A great app with lots of info, and the bundle checker is great. The fact that it can save multiple farms makes it one of the best Stardew tools apps.

This is a five star app, hands down. The calendar feature is fantastic and easy and lets me add my own notes. the bundles check list is convenient. What would make this app even better us just more content and lists. There is already a list of all fish, perhaps add a list of all crops, recipes, museum items, and more!

The app is pretty good but lacking in content. I would like to know what buildings I can build what the material cost is and what animals it houses. Also a list of animals you can get and how to obtain them. a list of crops/seasons and the gold cost and where to get them. Maybe a hint menu for the most valuable crop for the season and the bundle needed for the season for the community center. this app is ok but doesn't offer anything more than a free app.
Best companion app for stardew valley.

This is a great app for people who like to keep their farms organised and have their progress all in one easy to reference place. Clean, easy-to-use interface and the informative reminders make this a great tool. The only thing I would love to see added is the ability to set the custom reminders to repeat every 'x' days for things that don't work on a weekly schedule. Highly recommend this app.
Great basic reference. Looking forward to more features like farm upgrade references, recipes and crafting.
This app has helped me with keeping track with my farm and I really like it I hope that more features can be added in such as the villagers schedules.
I absolutely love this app. However, it keeps crashing on my Google Pixel everytime the phone goes on standby.

4 stars for the planner calendar functionality... makes my life in stardew so much easier and productive!! couldnt be happier to have paid for this app. If i could make a suggestion to also include recipe and building ingredient breakdowns in their own sections so i can refer to the wiki even less... then ill change my review to 5 stars!

This is a great app. I love being able to put notes on certain days and I was pleasantly surprised to find out I could even make the notes repeat. The interface is very well laid out and nice to look at as well.
This is an amazing app. It was great with helping me not waste time in Stardew Valley. I especially love the fact that you can have multiple farms because I have the game for both PC and PS Vita.
Unfortunately doesn't work on my Huawei p20 pro, just gets stuck in the initial loading/start screen.
replyContent: Sorry to hear you couldn't open the app, however, that is a bug that sometimes happens to some users and I wasn't able to reproduce and fix it. Normally users are able to make it work by reinstalling the app or just by waiting some time, maybe you can try that. Also, I have a lot of installs on Huawei P20 pro devices, so it's not a phone problem.

content: so so helpful i love it
It's extremely useful! I wish the fish were organized by season, though. Adding the villager schedules into the actual app would be nice too.

This app is a really wonderful companion to the game. UI is very clean and easy to use, and I love being able to add notes and keep track of bundles. I'd love to be able to have more info on farming though, like a planner of how many days to harvest, that sort of thing!

This is exactly what I was looking for. It reminds you of things to do during specific days and is especially useful if you don't want to miss out on anything. It's also a lot faster than searching for something on the wiki and even links you to it for certain things.
Great app!
Excellent app.

This is an amazing app to use with Stardew Valley! It helps you keep track of everything, from to do lists for each in-game day, to what types of fish you've caught, to every individual villagers likes and dislikes! The user interface is incredibly clean and so easy to use. Love it!

This app is genius, it is the perfect tool to help out in stardew valley. A little more information here and there but for the most part simply amazing. Shout out to the creator,nice job and keep up the good work . The only request i have is maybe put some more tips or suggestions on how to go about your days efficiently to be successful,im having a little trouble financially first season.
Best Stardew app out here!
Super helpful app
So glad that a description for "all universal loves", etc. was added!
good app, but need more improvement such as crops prices, animal detail, and seed growth duration information
Love this app. A must have for Stardew farmers.
Good but has to improve in bugs

I love this app, it's very user friendly and definitely helps me keep on top of things like birthdays and the community bundles, amongst other things. Would be great to see an update with information on how to trigger heart events under each villager.
Love this app! Will say if it could get a tracker for Recipes, and item craft tracker that would be awesome! Otherwise keep up the good work!
Needs crafting checklist to mark off what items have been crafted for the achievement. Would also be nice to have a cooking one as well.

Great app for a stardew valley player. Only thing I'd like to see is having the time schedules for where to find everyone in the app rather than linking. From other reviews it sounds like this is planned but not added yet. One other suggestion is maybe support for landscape orientation as I use it mainly on my tablet but can't set it on my desk with the stand landscape and use this app.
Super helpful for keeping track of tasks and bundles!
Great app easy to use interface. Highly recommend it.

Best one.
I like this app very much But I wish that we can have crafting list we can check 5/5 stars for this app as it helps me a lot

content: I love this app. It's so convenient to have all the info I need whether it be villagers favorite gifts or the community center checklist and even just knowing when the last day to plant certain crops in time for one last harvest of that specific crop. Honestly the app was a steal for the price its priced at. And with daily advice like what days to check the TV at and what days you can visit the traveling cart this app is well worth every penny!

This app is incredibly useful thanks to the ability to have multiple farms. The fact that you can also check off artifacts, minerals, bundles and fish you have acquired really helps to keep me on track of what I want to do. The calander is great and the gift guide is wonderful. I just wish there was building info. Throw that in and it's five stars from me. Thanks for the great product.
replyContent: Hello farmer, thank you very much for your comments :) I'm actually planning to including buildings in the next releases

content: It's great! I just wish there was more info about farm buildings or to do list, that would be awesome!
replyContent: Hello farmer, thank you very much for your comments :) I'm planning to had buildings to the next releases

content: Fantastic app for tracking the day today goings on in Stardew Valley in addition to farm progress with regards to the museum and the Community Center.
replyContent: Thank you very much for you comment Daniel :) I'm very glad you're enjoying the app!

content: Pls add crafting guide in the next updates. This app is very helpful.
replyContent: Hello Palat, thank you for your comment :) crafting is already on my backlog, thank you!

content: Edit: You need this app if your a Stardew lover. It's so pretty and easy to use. It gets updated constantly with the dev listening to users! Eventually it'll be like the Wiki but better and easier to find things. Couldn't ask for more, I've recommended to several friends and they all love it. 15/10 totally worth the money!
replyContent: Thank you so much for the awesome comment! I'm glad you're enjoying the app so far :) and there are more updates coming very soon!

content: It's wonderful and very convenient

I have really been enjoying the clean design and UI of this app. It is very apparent the developer has thought of the end user. I feel it would be nice to be able to track progression for skills and tools (and their accompanying costs) as well as having a resource of costs for farm building upgrades in the app. It would definitely help with the completionist in me! All in all, a great app, and I'm looking forward to seeing the continued updates. Thanks for your work!

content: This is a great app! Easy interface, great day planner, but it seems to have everything but store and shop menus; that would be my one suggestion. Thank you for the great app :)

content: Genuinely only bought this because the UI looks real good, so I thought I'd give you my money. Edit: can now confirm the UI is real nice to use.

content: This app helps me keep track of all the items I harvested, found, and donated. The app gives a daily list that helps the farmer know when to plant certain items. Get this app if you want to maximize your Stardew experience. I'm so glad I found it!

content: Thank you for making the app. Its amazing. Looking forward for the nicer interface. Thanks again!

content: Very well put together

content: While not comprehensive (yet) this app is great! I can easily find what villagers love and special events. I didn't think I would use it very much when I first bought it. But I find I use it more than the wiki!

content: Hi! Thanks so much for putting this together, this is awesome! One suggestion - is it possible to have "notes" on file recurring annually (like your anniversary)? That would be awesome. Other than that, i'm really diggin it! Thanks again!!

content: I love how it helps with getting organized in the game. One of my favorite features is the daily calendar, which reminds me of special events, birthdays, special sales at the traveling cart, Krobus, Sandy's, or even last days to plant a certain crop for the season.

content:
I really loved this app so far! Especially from being from an independent 
person. I have two recommendations though! It would be really cool if you

like that
replyContent: Hello Jazmyn, thank you very much for the awesome review! I think you'll be happy to hear that I'm already working on a feature to allow users to have multiple farms on the app, I hope to have it finished as soon as possible. Universal likes/hates/etc will also be included in a future release :)

content:
Very well done. Easy to use format. Helps keep track collectables and

replyContent: I'm glad you're enjoying the app so far Tino :)

content:
I love this app! It helps me keep track of alot of things! It is worth the 
buy! A few suggestions is make a list of artifacts that could be found and 
checked off! Also I would really love to see a drop down schedule instead 
of a linkto the wiki! Otherwise the app has a wonderful look an system!
replyContent: Thank you so much for the awesome review :D I'm planning to include the museum in the next update (artifacts + minerals), like I've included the fishes in the latest one. About the schedule, I wanted to include it when I first released the app, but the amount of data I needed was huge so I postponed that for later, but don't worry, it'll come!
